      • createActor

        private static IActor createActor(java.lang.String type,
                                  int pinNumber,
                                  java.lang.String systemCode,
                                  int unitCode,
                                  java.util.List<IActor> alreadyParsedActors,
                                  java.lang.String location)
        Create a actor object from the config information.
        Parameters:
        type - Actor type.
        pinNumber - GPIO pin number (wiringPi format).
        systemCode - Connection system code.
        unitCode - Connection unit code.
        alreadyParsedActors - List of already parsed actors.
        location - Location of the actor.
        Returns:
        Created actor.
